section.name: Building AndroMDA
section.p: Building AndroMDA from the source is quite easy. Make sure you have Maven installed. Unpack andromda-src-*.zip into a directory of your choice. Change to the directory where you unpacked the contents, and then type: maven Thats's it! The contents will be installed into both your local maven repository (for maven users) and the target/dist (for those still using Ant).
The same rules apply if you want to build from CVS version. Just checkout the andromda-all module from AndroMDA CVS, and proceed as before.
